privacy.title: Privacy Policy

privacy.section2_content: We use your personal data to provide and manage our services, including processing payments, authenticating users, and improving our AI models (where explicitly consented).
privacy.section3_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way.
privacy.contact_info: For more details, contact us at support@zentriv.co.
